name: Name
privacy_content:
Welcome to Heshi App!

We take your privacy protection very seriously. Before using this app, please read and agree to the following privacy policy:

1. Information Collection
We only collect information necessary to provide services, including but not limited to device information, usage logs, etc.

2. Information Use
We use the collected information to improve service quality, provide personalized experiences, and ensure secure app operation.

3. Information Protection
We adopt industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.

4. Information Sharing
We will not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties unless we have your explicit consent or are required by law.

5. User Rights
You have the right to access, correct, delete your personal information, or withdraw consent.

6. Policy Updates
We may update this privacy policy from time to time, and the updated policy will be published in the app.

Continued use of this app indicates your agreement to this privacy policy.
